summary: Overall user feedback is mixed. While there is strong positive sentiment regarding the new UI design and the competence of the staff, significant concerns were raised about mobile performance and confusing billing practices. Customer support is seen as responsive but not always effective in resolving issues.

topics.summary: Feedback on the user interface is overwhelmingly positive. Customers find the new design modern, intuitive, and a major improvement over the previous version.
Users are expressing significant frustration with the application's performance, citing very slow loading times and frequent crashes, especially on mobile devices.
Opinions on customer support are mixed. While users appreciate the fast response times, many feel their issues are not fully resolved on the first contact.
There is notable concern regarding the pricing structure. Users find the billing process confusing and believe the service is overpriced for the value provided.
Feedback on project management is generally positive, highlighting clear communication and adherence to deadlines.

quotes.text: The new dashboard looks amazing, so much easier to use!
It takes forever to load on my iPhone since the update.
Support replied fast, but didn't really solve my issue.
The billing is a complete mess. We were overcharged for hours that were not worked.

feedback_analysis.text: The new dashboard is beautifully designed and very intuitive.
I love the new look, it's a huge improvement!
The application is extremely slow on my Android phone.
It constantly freezes when I try to save my work.
Support team was very responsive and helpful.
The agent was friendly but my ticket is still open after 3 days.
The price is too high for what it offers.
We were overcharged last month and it was a nightmare to get it corrected.
The project manager kept us in the loop with daily updates.
The layout is clean and easy to navigate.

feedback_replies.feedback_text: The application is extremely slow on my Android phone.
feedback_replies.feedback_reply: We're truly sorry to hear about the performance issues you're facing on Android. We understand how frustrating that can be and have passed this feedback to our development team for immediate investigation. Thank you for letting us know.

feedback_replies.feedback_text: The new dashboard is beautifully designed and very intuitive.
feedback_replies.feedback_reply: Thank you so much for the wonderful feedback! We're thrilled to hear you're enjoying the new dashboard design. Comments like yours make all our hard work worthwhile!

feedback_replies.feedback_text: The agent was friendly but my ticket is still open after 3 days.
feedback_replies.feedback_reply: Thank you for sharing your experience. We're glad our agent was friendly, but we sincerely apologize that your issue has not been resolved yet. We are looking into your ticket with high priority to see what's causing the delay.

feedback_replies.feedback_text: We were overcharged last month and it was a nightmare to get it corrected.
feedback_replies.feedback_reply: We are very sorry to hear about the billing issue and the difficulty you experienced in getting it resolved. This is not the standard we aim for. A senior member of our billing team will be reaching out to you directly to correct this.
